name: Hero's Journey
description: Joseph Campbell's monomyth structure following the hero's transformative journey

ordinary_world.name: Ordinary World
ordinary_world.description: The hero's normal life before the adventure begins

call_to_adventure.name: Call to Adventure
call_to_adventure.description: The hero is presented with a problem or challenge

refusal_of_call.name: Refusal of the Call
refusal_of_call.description: The hero hesitates or refuses the adventure due to fear or doubt

meeting_mentor.name: Meeting the Mentor
meeting_mentor.description: The hero encounters a wise figure who gives advice, guidance, or magical gifts

crossing_threshold.name: Crossing the First Threshold
crossing_threshold.description: The hero commits to the adventure and enters the special world

tests_allies_enemies.name: Tests, Allies, and Enemies
tests_allies_enemies.description: The hero faces challenges and makes allies and enemies in the special world

approach.name: Approach to the Inmost Cave
approach.description: The hero prepares for the major challenge in the special world

ordeal.name: The Ordeal
ordeal.description: The hero faces their greatest fear or most difficult challenge

reward.name: The Reward
reward.description: The hero survives and gains something from the experience

road_back.name: The Road Back
road_back.description: The hero begins the journey back to the ordinary world

resurrection.name: Resurrection
resurrection.description: The hero faces a final test and is transformed by the experience

return_with_elixir.name: Return with the Elixir
return_with_elixir.description: The hero returns home transformed and with something to benefit the ordinary world
